name: Savage Gardens
description:
Hey!

It's my first game! Done over quarantine in game maker studio over ~3 months. Classic tower defense with towers that grow over time. Enemy art from here: https://zapatopi.net/icon/ and all towers drawn with a mouse by yours truly.

Click the dirt mounds to plant towers you have in your loadout. Use the watering can to help them grow. The Yellow levels unlock new towers. Hint, armored enemies have a flat damage reduction so lower damage towers may not do much, I'll leave the rest for you to discover.

-Phil
